ITEMIZE.label: DEFINITION

ITEM.label: scs_m: Scilab mlist, Scicos diagram data structure defined by the

ITEMIZE.ITEM: formal name 'diagram' and containing the following fields:

ITEMIZE.label: FIELDS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : Scilab mlist, parameters data structure (See scicos_params).
: block or link or deleted object data structure. Deleted object data structure is marked list('Deleted').

DESCRIPTION.P: Scicos editor uses and modifies the Scicos editor main data structure to keep all information relative to the edited diagram. Scicos compiler uses it as a input.
